patthana23.18:1.1_0: Nakusalo naajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.18:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte atthiyā avigate nava.
patthana23.18:2.1_0: Nakusalo nabahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.18:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā cha, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte atthiyā avigate nava.
patthana23.18:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.18:4.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
